sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: Clear overview of the project including objectives, scope, and outcomes

scoring_guide.9-10: Exceptional summary with all key elements clearly articulated
scoring_guide.7-8: Strong summary with most key elements present
scoring_guide.5-6: Adequate summary but missing some important details

sections.name: Project Scope & Objectives
sections.description: Well-defined project boundaries, deliverables, and SMART objectives

scoring_guide.13-15: Comprehensive scope definition with clear, measurable objectives
scoring_guide.10-12: Good scope and objectives with minor gaps
scoring_guide.7-9: Basic scope definition, objectives need refinement
scoring_guide.4-6: Vague scope or poorly defined objectives
scoring_guide.0-3: Unclear or missing scope and objectives

sections.name: Timeline & Milestones
sections.description: Detailed project timeline with clear milestones, dependencies, and deadlines

scoring_guide.13-15: Comprehensive timeline with realistic milestones, dependencies mapped, and contingency built in
scoring_guide.10-12: Good timeline with most milestones identified and reasonable deadlines
scoring_guide.7-9: Basic timeline present but lacking detail or milestone clarity
scoring_guide.4-6: Incomplete timeline with vague or missing milestones
scoring_guide.0-3: No meaningful timeline or milestones provided

sections.name: Resource Allocation
sections.description: Clear identification and allocation of human, financial, and material resources

scoring_guide.13-15: Thorough resource plan with roles, responsibilities, and resource optimization strategies
scoring_guide.10-12: Good resource allocation with most roles and resources identified
scoring_guide.7-9: Basic resource identification but lacking detailed allocation plan
scoring_guide.4-6: Incomplete resource planning with significant gaps

sections.name: Risk Management
sections.description: Identification of potential risks, impact assessment, and mitigation strategies

scoring_guide.13-15: Comprehensive risk register with probability/impact analysis and detailed mitigation plans
scoring_guide.10-12: Good risk identification with reasonable mitigation strategies
scoring_guide.7-9: Some risks identified but mitigation strategies are underdeveloped
scoring_guide.4-6: Minimal risk identification with weak or missing mitigation plans

sections.name: Budget & Cost Analysis
sections.description: Detailed budget breakdown, cost estimates, and financial justification

scoring_guide.13-15: Detailed budget with line items, cost justification, and variance analysis
scoring_guide.10-12: Good budget with most costs identified and reasonable estimates
scoring_guide.7-9: Basic budget present but lacking detail or justification
scoring_guide.4-6: Incomplete budget with significant gaps in cost analysis
scoring_guide.0-3: No meaningful budget or cost analysis provided

sections.name: Stakeholder Communication Plan
sections.description: Strategy for keeping stakeholders informed, communication channels, and reporting frequency

scoring_guide.9-10: Comprehensive communication plan with stakeholder mapping, channels, and cadence defined
scoring_guide.7-8: Good communication strategy with most stakeholders and channels addressed
scoring_guide.5-6: Basic communication plan but lacking stakeholder analysis or channel strategy
scoring_guide.3-4: Minimal communication planning with significant gaps

sections.name: Quality Metrics
sections.description: Defined quality standards, KPIs, and measurement methods for project success

scoring_guide.5: Clear, measurable quality metrics with defined thresholds and tracking methods
scoring_guide.3-4: Some quality metrics defined but could be more specific or measurable
scoring_guide.1-2: Vague quality goals without measurable criteria
